ygData.subject: Re: Quills and Parchment
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Writing these magic messages to ask what quills and parchments are for. Seriously, though, as near as I can tell, they are a leftover from some great plan
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:00 PM 5/11/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>
>What are quills and parchment used for?

Writing these magic messages to ask what quills and parchments are for.

Seriously, though, as near as I can tell, they are a leftover from some
great plan to allow spellcasters to scribe scrolls. It never worked.

Kinda like the leftover Bardic instrument-making materials you see all over
(pieces of bamboo, unfinished brass trumpets, etc.) it's a leftover from a
bygone era.


Talies on Bristlebane
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
